Name: National Trust of Australia (Victoria), Conservation Division

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Wed and Fri 9am-12:30pm and 2-4pm; closed Christmas and New Year period. Reference assistance available in person and by telephone. Copying services available for original records to A3, photographs, newspapers, maps and plans. Copying is charged at 10c a page. Referral to paid researcher available.

About.Access: Appointment with the Secretary required for visit.

About.Acquisition focus: Largest collection of material on heritage properties in Victoria. Files on over 6,000 properties (including some now demolished), heritage precincts (urban, rural and cultural/natural landscapes), significant trees, gardens. Also photographs.

About.Major holdings: National Trust (Victoria): Property Files 1956- (55m) Trust Owned Properties 1956- (17m) Landscapes (10m) Urban Conservation Areas (7m) Gardens/Significant Trees (5m)

Contact.Street address: Tasma Terrace, Parliament Place, East Melbourne 3002
